programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Hauling a heavy load in gigantic trucks is no joke, and this reality series follows truckers, also known as asphalt cowboys, as they earn their money transporting heavy goods across the European continent. Battling the elements, strict time constraints, and the loneliness of being away from home, these truckers fire up their engines and waste no time on the road, ensuring their clients goods arrive on time and in one piece!

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Dude, Youre Screwed
programme.desc: Unique, adrenaline-filled docu-reality series that follows five unprepared survivalists who are dropped into some of the worlds harshest environments, and they must make their way back to civilisation within 100 hours. Meet Green Beret Terry Schappert, primitive survival expert Matt Graham, former Navy SEAL Jake Zweig, Army veteran Tom Moore and RAF survival expert John Hudson. In each episode, one of them is captured by surprise, blindfolded and dropped to some remote location around the world by his fellow survivalists. He has 100 hours to find his way back, using only the survival kit that contains some useful, but also some more unusual items. Participant wears a biometric belt, which allows the team to determine if he gets into a critical condition, and if that happens he is disqualified and automatically loses the game.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates investigates the sudden disappearance of notorious Teamster president Jimmy Hoffa. New technology aids in the search for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates examines an alleged alien abduction, the bizarre death of an American heros son, and invisible attacks made upon CIA operatives in Cuba.

programme.title: Mystery Of Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Locals say that Bling Frog Ranch in Utah is a cursed land, a place that should not been interfered with, a place where strange things just seem to happen. Rumours have long circulated about a lost treasure hidden somewhere on the ranch, and that the mysterious land is trying to hold on to something. This reality series follows Duane Ollinger as he throws everything he has at finding its hidden treasures, but every time he thinks he close, another peculiar incident arises.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates investigates the sudden disappearance of notorious Teamster president Jimmy Hoffa. New technology aids in the search for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates examines an alleged alien abduction, the bizarre death of an American heros son, and invisible attacks made upon CIA operatives in Cuba.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Building Off the Grid
programme.desc: For many, an ideal existence is as far away from the bustling boulevards and city streets as is physically possible, opting to live in a serene and secluded corner of our planet. This documentary series follows teams of adventuring builders as they construct magnificent and unique properties in far-flung corners of our planet. Battling against adverse conditions, limited budgets and narrow deadlines, these crews strive to get their structures erected in time. From mountain cabins to woodland yurts, shipping container homes to lighthouse conversions, these stunning properties show the true meaning of living off the grid.

programme.title: Building Off the Grid

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Building Alaska is a reality and documentary TV series following a cast of characters who set out to construct three incredible cabins in the obscure Alaskan wilderness. There are no roads and no building supply centers around, and they have to deal with extreme weather conditions, not to mention curious animals. From the foundation to doors and windows, finishing with interior work and electrical system, everything should be done, so hours and hours of hard work are ahead of the participants.

programme.title: Building Alaska

programme.title: Filthy Fortunes
programme.desc: Matt takes on a rock star mess to find classic guitars and amps, vintage trucks and rare Harleys. The hoards heavy metal puts the team at risk.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: At a call on the Strip, tow truck driver Shawn is shocked by a six-foot python in a cars front seat. TW tangles with a motel customer twice his size.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Halloween on the strip means huge crowds and Vegas scariest tows. A drunk man dressed like a giant baby refuses to let Shawn tow his car.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Olivia puts an end to a ruse when she spots two gentlemen trying to swap their luggage. Paddy the Dog discovers narcotics at the border in Skåne.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Filthy Fortunes
programme.desc: Matt takes on a rock star mess to find classic guitars and amps, vintage trucks and rare Harleys. The hoards heavy metal puts the team at risk.

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: NASAS Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europes Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: Alien Invaders!
programme.desc: Alien Invaders is a documentary special that throws three young, but experienced, hosts into the world of invasive species of animals, fish, birds, insects, viruses and plants to create television mayhem. The show looks at invasions of aggressive non-indigenous animals around the world. Pacific lionfish are eating their way through the Caribbean, Burmese pythons are infesting the Everglades, African killer bees have worked their way north from Brazil to Utah, Asian carp are now swimming in the millions from New Orleans to Chicago. These and many other "alien invaders" are the villains (and stars!) of our show.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium, A Very Presentable Killer
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters investigate Thackray Medical Museum, believed to one of Leeds most haunted buildings. Workers claim to have witnessed constant paranormal activity in the museum and one claim is that two Victorian ghosts are trapped inside of the location.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bienvenido a Miami! We take a look at the history behind Floridas modern metropolis. We visit the Ancient Spanish Monastery, see the opulence of the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and head into the swamp to learn about the Miccosukee indians.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: All the essentials for going on, and having a successful safari are covered before our host gets a very special challenge—to find at least half of the "Big Twelve" on one safari drive. Four hours and six (6) very special animals—can he do it using his own rules for a successful safari?

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Fashion designer Ji Cheng has shown her designs at London fashion week and, like beauty stylist A Zhi, is beginning to challenge the monopoly of Western brands in China. New levels of expendable income mean the wallets of the wealthy elite are helping fund this rising beauty scene and creating a market for luxury goods for shrewd businesswoman Felicity Feng. Expats from everywhere are trying to gain a foothold in this blossoming city, but can they handle its lightning speed?

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit. The sky above is littered with stars and countless galaxies. It is where we come from and where we are destined to return. The first phase of this journey is complete, now commences the second, with robotics, advanced technologies and sheer daring we are now going where before we only dreamt.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: If you ever go camping there is one thing you do not want to leave home without, the SWISS ARMY KNIFE! Well explain how it evolved into the most famous knife in the world and how the companys name got "CUT" together! And where did the term CUP OF JOE come from as well as the word JAVA? And we all love a juicy HAMBURGER, so where did these chopped meat patties come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn how ALMOND NUTS get transformed into "MILK." And why are movie TRAILERS shown at the beginning of the film? Well keep your attention so youll want to stick around for the answer. And learn how detergents make your clothes SEEM brighter and whiter.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: China Uncovered is a documentary exploring the changing culture of China, from everyday life to nature and cities, from tradition to modernism. Discover this country from the perspective of locals, including a photographer, a laborer and an architect. Witness how Shanghai turned into a mega city from a small fishing village, and how is that affecting the everyday life and traditional practices and beliefs.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Animals with certain adaptations are more likely to be stronger and therefore produce more young. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old, whereas dinosaurs became extinct 64 million years ago. Crocodiles have an incredible ability to adapt and survive in the Race of Life. They have a very slow metabolism, and can go up to a year with no food. They also have a 4 chamber heart that helps them control their temperature, and lungs that allow them to hold their breath underwater for up to 2 hours. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well. The modern descendants of ancient sharks have incorporated many of the successful traits of the past. They have changed over time, but the changes have not been too extreme, only nature perfecting an originally near perfect design. Whales are an amazing species that have evolved from land dwelling creatures millions of years ago to the marine mammals we know today. Over the course of their evolution whales have developed echolocation, thick layers of blubber, modified lungs, better hearing and larger arteries among other things to ensure their survival and prosperity.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Deserts are dry. Deserts are extreme. True deserts get less than 18 cm of rain per year. True deserts have very few plants. Semi-desert habitats have enough rainfall to support more plant and animal life. Either way, deserts are not easy places for animals to live. Desert animals have evolved to handle the deserts heat and lack of water. They have adapted their bodies and behaviors to the desert climate. Most can survive on small amounts of water and many get all of their water from their food. Some drink maybe once a week and travel considerable distances to find isolated waterholes and springs. Large animals seek shade during the hottest part of the day. Some animals dig a hollow depression into the ground and lie in the cooler soil while others are nocturnal. Many reptiles and other animals protect themselves from the extreme temperature by spending their time in burrows. The scorpion is one of the most ancient creatures on earth, in existence since life first crawled out of the sea. One look and you can see why theyre born survivors. Not only are their bodies armoured against the desert heat - and other predators - but all scorpions have pincers at the front and a poisonous sting at the end of their tail. Rattlesnakes can be two meters long. Theyre fast, tough and with a deadly venom, making them one of the most dangerous snakes in the world. But nobody seems to have told the Roadrunner, who regard rattlesnakes as quite suitable prey.

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours - road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: After American troops liberated Wiltz, Luxembourg in 1944, the townspeople were finally able to celebrate Saint Nicholas Day again after five years of Nazi occupation. Soldiers from the 28th Infantry Division organized a special event for the children, with Corporal Richard Brookins playing Saint Nick, riding in a jeep and handing out treats. Just ten days later, the Battle of the Bulge began, and the soldiers left Wiltz. Grateful for their kindness, the town began an annual "American St. Nick" celebration in 1947, retracing Brookins route. Brookins only learned of this tradition in 1977, when he was invited back and honored as a hero.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hull to investigate ghostly goings on inside of a former chocolate factory. The investigation turns out to be no picnic, as the ghosts haunting make direct contact with the team.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Un-Belizable! Were off on a Central American Mayan excursion. We head up the steps of the ancient high temple at Lamanai. Then we take a city tour of the main tourist destination, Belize City. We learn about Belizes colonial roots at the Belize City History Museum and dive the amazing Blue Hole.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This show features some segments that didnt fit in their respective episodes. We play around at the Pinball Museum in Las Vegas. Then, we salute the Commander in Chief at the Presidential Hall of Fame in Clermont, FL. Also, well swim with real mermaids at Weeki Wachee Springs in Central Florida, and cheer on Teddy Ballgame at the Ted Williams Hitters Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the suns glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset. Venus the first and brightest star in the evening sky, and Mercury fleeting across the solar disk. They are half of our solar systems terrestrial planets yet we know so little. As we begin to take a closer look at our companions they are posing more questions than answers.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed with exciting tidbits and fascinating facts that uncover the truths and origins behind the stuff youre already familiar with. From the items you use every day to the phrases you use in conversation to the habits youre so accustomed to, youll be fascinated to learn how theyve all really come about! Learn how a pharmacist and an accountant created the most famous drink in the world, COCA COLA! And, learn the "BEAR" truth behind how a U.S. president helped create everyones favorite stuffed toy, THE TEDDY BEAR! Then, how did a piece of wire accidentally "SLINK" its way to become a fantastic fun toy for children? Plus, how a the WIFFLE BALL was invented.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity popsicle! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the barbershop? Youll be in stitches when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the microwave!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Shark Business unravels some of the mysteries surrounding sharks with controversial behaviorist Dr. Erich Ritter. Youll witness divers testing the limits of shark-human interaction outside of cages with dangerous sharks such as lemon, bull and even great white sharks! Recount the events that led to the attack that almost killed Dr. Ritter. Witness a feeding Frenzy of over 100 reef sharks in the Bahamas, and see a diver literally ride a Great White Shark in Gansbai, South Africa! This episode has shark action like you have never seen before!

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Giants of San Benedicto features Dr. Robert Rubin and his ground-breaking research of giant Mantas. Youll travel to the remote Socorro Islands off Mexicos Pacific coast and see breath-taking encounters with enormous manta rays. Youre sure to love these majestic giants as you see how they invite human contact, and encourage certain divers to ride them. The film crew also travels to the Bahamas to visit Bubbles, a fifteen foot Manta in the worlds largest aquarium, and witness her release back into the ocean.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial – a predator – that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia – a Tiger Quoll – smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: The Tigers From Scotland
programme.desc: Narrated by Iain Glen, this film focuses on the fragile existence of the Scottish Wildcats, their status and what conservation efforts are being undertaken to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Coral Sea Dreaming
programme.desc: Coral Sea Dreaming enters into the very heart of life - and death - on a coral reef. It is a story that spans 500 million years and stars some of the most exotic and wonderous marine creatures on earth. Coral is the planets greatest natu- ral architect, and coral reefs boast the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem.

Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete, kas ieradusies mājās no koledžas, tiek nogalināta un viņas nonāvēšanas rīki izrādās rullītis un grebšanas nazis, ko ģimene plānoja izmantot Pateicības dienas vakariņās. Izmeklētājiem ir grūti atrisināt šīs svētku šausmas.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atskatās uz 1937. gadā notikušo jaunas dāmas slepkavību Leitonā Buzzardā - viņa tika atrasta nožņaugta ar pašas šalli alejā, ko vietējie iedzīvotāji dēvē par "mīļotāju joslu".

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Sūzena Kaminga. Viņa ir mantiniece un miljardiera ieroču tirgotāja meita. Roberto Vilegass. Viņš ir cienīts argentīniešu polo spēlētājs. Abu pasaules saduras 140 hentāru lielā īpašumā. Un tikai viens izdzīvos, lai par to runātu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Tupaks Šakurs bija revolucionārs, dzejnieks un mūzikas industrijas fenomens. Nošauts 25 gadu vecumā, bet viņa nāve joprojām ir noslēpums. Līdz izmeklētāji atklāj jaunu, satraucošu notikumu...

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Agrā Ziemassvētku vakara stundā tirdzniecības centra autostāvvietā tiek atrasts nošauts vīrietis un sieviete. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka šo nežēlīgo slepkavību varētu būt izraisījis mīlas trīsstūris.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete pazūd pēc 4. jūlija pludmales ballītes. Izmeklētājiem ir tikai dažas norādes, ko darīt tālāk. Lietas pavērsiens atklāj, ka viņa varētu būt jaunākais upuris plēsoņam, kas terorizē šo apkārtni.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Pamesta automašīna, kas piepildīta ar asinīm, ved izmeklētājus pazudušās sievietes un viņas pusaugu meitas pēdās, kas nekad neieradās uz ģimenes ballīti 4. jūlijā. Viņu mirstīgās atliekas tiek atrastas dīķī, un mazpilsētā katrs tiek turēts aizdomās.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs pēta lietu, kurā pretrunīgi vērtētā policista nogalināšana lika aizdomās turēt desmitiem cilvēku un beidzās ar trīs vīriešu došanos uz karātavām.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs pēta šausminošu Viktorijas laikmeta slepkavības lietu no 1863. gada. Tajā pazudis kabatas pulkstenis izrādījās būtisks pierādījums, kā dēļ vīrietis tika notiesāts un pakārts.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Pēc ballēšanās nošauts alternatīvi domājošs pusaudzis. Policija izmeklē vai to nevajadzētu uzskatīt par naida noziegumu.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Pazūd sieviete stāvoklī, atklājas šaušalīgs noziegums, ko pavada skarbs un netipisks motīvs.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Sekojot slepkavām, ģimene ir spiesta konfrontēt ļaunumu savā vidū.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Jaunas sievietes ķermenis tiek atrasts paslēpts niedrēs klusā parkā vairākus kvartālus no viņas mājām. Visu Kvīnsas apkaimi pārņem bailes. Pēc mēnešiem ilgas nemitīgas izmeklēšanas, pagātnes pavediens noved Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētājus pie negaidīta slepkavas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Dažas dienas pirms Jaunās tūkstošgades ieslodzītais informators zvana policijai ar noslēpumainu informāciju par slepkavību. Tas liek desmitiem izmeklētāju doties uz Ņujorkas augstceltnēm, meklējot nozieguma vietu un līķi.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kad kalna galā aizdomīgi mirst 140 hektāru liela īpašuma īpašnieks, Orindžas apgabala Virdžīnijas štatā visu skatieni pievēršas viņa glītajai otrajai sievai, kas savulaik bija viņa pirmās sievas patversmes medmāsa. Vai viņa ir vainīga vīrieša nogalināšanā?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: 14 gadus vecā Keitija Tarboksa un slepenpoliciste Mišela Dīrija iesaistās kopīgā misijā: atklāt noslēpumus par seksuālajiem uzbrucējiem internetā. Cik tālu viņas dosies, lai uzzinātu, vai viņu tiešsaistes spēļu biedri ir īsti vai vienkārši spēlē savdabīgu pavedināšanas spēli?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Izmeklētāji atklāj nacionālu pagrīdes organizāciju, kas sniedz biedriem konkrētus norādījumus, kā organizēt "nāves notikumus", lai netiktu atklāti. Cik daudzi nomirs, pirms atklās patiesību?

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Vīrietis, kurš valkā vilka masku, Helovīnā nodūra sievieti un viņas nedzimušo bērnu. Izmeklētājiem ir jānomierina sabiedrība un jāatrod slepkava, pirms viņš uzbrūk atkal.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete, kas ieradusies mājās no koledžas, tiek nogalināta un viņas nonāvēšanas rīki izrādās rullītis un grebšanas nazis, ko ģimene plānoja izmantot Pateicības dienas vakariņās. Izmeklētājiem ir grūti atrisināt šīs svētku šausmas.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izmeklē noslēpumaino zemnieka nošaušanu Īrijas laukos 1882. gadā. Vai apšaubāma aculiecinieka liecība varēja likt divus nevainīgus vīriešus nosūtīt uz karātavām?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda izskata bēdīgi slavenu lietu par ražīgiem zagļiem Edvardu Devlinu un Alfrēdu Bērnsu, kuriem tika piespriests nāvessods par Beatrises Rimmeres slepkavību 1951. gadā Mančestrā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atskatās uz 1937. gadā notikušo jaunas dāmas slepkavību Leitonā Buzzardā - viņa tika atrasta nožņaugta ar pašas šalli alejā, ko vietējie iedzīvotāji dēvē par "mīļotāju joslu".

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis salūzt pēc bērnības traumas rētu uzplēšanas. Vai likums viņu uztvers kā slepkavu vai cietēju?

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Slepkava par mērķi uzstāda pilsētas likumsargu komūnu. Vai viņu notvers pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Divas jaunas sievietes ierodas Ņujorkā ar sapņiem par lielpilsētu. Nejauša tikšanās izraisa notikumu virkni, kas šos sapņus sagrauj uz visiem laikiem. Izmeklētājiem tikmēr jāapkopo virkne mulsinošu pavedienu, lai sauktu slepkavas pie atbildības.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Rodžers Brūks - populārs administrators vienā no vecākajiem Ņujorkas restorāniem - atrasts nogalināts savā dzīvoklī pilsētas slavenajā "Restorānu alejā". Izmeklētāji atklāj upura slēpto dzīvi un stindzinošo iespēju sagaidīt jaunus upurus.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pazūd jauna baņķiere, un policija apkopo pēdejos mirkļus, kad viņa redzēta. Izmeklēšana noved viņus pie profesionāļa, kurš nav tāds, kā viņš sevi parāda.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls uzzina, ka puisis, kuram viņš nozaga naudu, grasījās izmantot naudu laimīgās loterijas biļetes iegādei. Viņš atdod viņam naudu, kas ļoti sanikno Rendiju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls palīdz Džojai atbrīvoties no zagtas mašīnas, bet rodas problēma, kad viņi tajā kādu atrod.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžu Blūtu vecāko apciemo fane, kura, iespējams, ir viņā iemīlējusies. Džordžs Maikls ir ieinteresēts savā skolotājā, un tāpat arī viņa tēvs. Gobs cenšas atriebties Maiklam par mēģinājumu atņemt viņam draudzeni.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls saņem informāciju par uzņēmuma starptautiskajiem kontiem un liek Gobam izjautāt biroja sekretāri Kitiju. Pirms tam Maikls paveic neiedomājamo - noorganizē tikšanos starp Džordžu vecāko un Lusilu.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Ģimenes advokāts noorganizē Džordža vecākā izlaišanu no cietuma Ziemassvētkos. Tikmēr Džordžam Maiklam skaistumkonkursā jāvalkā apkaunojošs galvassegs.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls saņem informāciju par uzņēmuma starptautiskajiem kontiem un liek Gobam izjautāt biroja sekretāri Kitiju. Pirms tam Maikls paveic neiedomājamo - noorganizē tikšanos starp Džordžu vecāko un Lusilu.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls nolemj Martu pakļaut Goba sieviešu apmānīšanai, liekot viņai piedalīties burvju trikā. Tajā iesaistīta viena no daudzajām Goba draudzenēm.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Darbs ēstuvē Kellijai krīt uz nerviem, tāpēc viņa nolemj sacelties, iegādājoties motociklu, kuru Pegija uzskata par pārāk bīstamu. Tomēr Pegija to izmēģina pati un gūst negaidīti labas emocijas. Tomēr tieši Als ir tas, kurš iemīl jauno moci, iztēlojoties sevi kā "vieglo braucēju"... vismaz līdz tikšanās brīdim ar Dodge.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija nolemj aizsākgt jaunu hobiju un uzzīmēt Alu. To darot, viņa izveido savu žurnāla karikatūru, kurā Als padara viņu slavenu. Viņa radījusi nelaimīgo apavu pārdevēju "Mr. Empty Pants". Als vēlētos, lai slava būtu īslaicīga, līdz kāds cits žurnāls (Playgirl) pasludina viņu par seksa simbolu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc vienas kārtējām sestdienām Bads parādās jaunā TV iepazīšanās spēļu šovā mazāk pieredzējušajiem "You Cant Miss". Tiesa, ne ar gaidītajiem rezultātiem. Kellija ar savu zemo IQ uzskata, ka pastāv sazvērestība, lai viņai neļautu uzzināt, kas šodien par dienu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc vienas kārtējām sestdienām Bads parādās jaunā TV iepazīšanās spēļu šovā mazāk pieredzējušajiem "You Cant Miss". Tiesa, ne ar gaidītajiem rezultātiem. Kellija ar savu zemo IQ uzskata, ka pastāv sazvērestība, lai viņai neļautu uzzināt, kas šodien par dienu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als nolemj kā vecāka gadagājuma pilsonis lēti iekļūt kino, un pēkšņi apjauš, ka viņš paliek vecs. Pēc tam viņš sāk uzvesties senili, bet kāds notikums viņu atgriež realitātē.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls atgriež hotdogu tirgošanas ratiņus, ko viņš savulaik nozaga, to likumīgajam īpašniekam. Tomēr viņa draugam Ralfam izdodas to aizdedzināt, liekot Erlam un viņa "bandai" ielauzties rātsnamā, lai lietas labotu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls cenšas kompensēt mūžīgo nodokļu nemaksāšanu. Diemžēl valdību viņa nauda neinteresē, tāpēc viņam ir jāizdomā cits veids, kā naudu atmaksāt.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls cenšas kompensēt sava tēva Mustang zaudēšanu dragreisa sacīkstēs, kad viņš bija bērns.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Kad Erls mēģina atgriezt universālveikalam numuriņu izsniegšanas aparātu, tas izraisa atmiņas par to, kā 2000. gada 1. janvārī banda ievācās universālveikalā, domājot, ka viņi bija vienīgie cilvēki, kas pilsētā dzīvoja pēc Y2K pasaules gala.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Kad Erls mēģina atgriezt universālveikalam numuriņu izsniegšanas aparātu, tas izraisa atmiņas par to, kā 2000. gada 1. janvārī banda ievācās universālveikalā, domājot, ka viņi bija vienīgie cilvēki, kas pilsētā dzīvoja pēc Y2K pasaules gala.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kā tas ir, kad ģimene ceļ un grauj vienlaicīgi? Par to komēdijseriāla septītajā sezonā turpinās pārliecināties Reimonds, saukts arī par Reju, kuram ir ne tikai sieva, trīs bērni un sava sporta sleja avīzē, bet arī kolorīti vecāki, kuri dzīvo tur pat pāri ielai, un brālis. Tā kā Rejs ir mātes luteklītis, tas ietekmē attiecības gan ar brāli, gan sievu un pārējiem ģimenes locekļiem. Seriāls balstīts uz patiesiem notikumiem - visiem tiem, kuri var notikt ar ikvienu no mums, tāpēc bez smiekliem neiztikt.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Basters lūdz Džordžam Maiklam nopirkt viņam marihuānu, lai ārstētu Lusilas Ostero reiboni. Maikls sarīko viltus aizturēšanu, lai Džordžs Maikls gūtu mācību.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžu Blūtu vecāko apciemo fane, kura, iespējams, ir viņā iemīlējusies. Džordžs Maikls ir ieinteresēts savā skolotājā, un tāpat arī viņa tēvs. Gobs cenšas atriebties Maiklam par mēģinājumu atņemt viņam draudzeni.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls uzstājas ar runu par mīlestību, kas liek Martai saprast, ka viņai ir jūtas pret viņu. Džordžs Maikls apjauš, ka Meibija, iespējams, nav viņa māsīca.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als notver kramplauzi, kurš kādā naktī ielauzies viņu mājā. Tas izdevies, jo pēc strīda ar Pegiju viņš gulējis uz dīvāna. Šī notikuma rezultātā Als kļuvis par apkaimes varoni. Taču situācija drīz mainās, jo kramplauzis iesūdz Alu tiesā par viņa ievainošanu, un Bandijiem atkal jāvēršas tiesā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als notver kramplauzi, kurš kādā naktī ielauzies viņu mājā. Tas izdevies, jo pēc strīda ar Pegiju viņš gulējis uz dīvāna. Šī notikuma rezultātā Als kļuvis par apkaimes varoni. Taču situācija drīz mainās, jo kramplauzis iesūdz Alu tiesā par viņa ievainošanu, un Bandijiem atkal jāvēršas tiesā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Al sliktais sniegums guļamistabā padara viņu par apsmieklu visā pilsētā - tas noticis pēc kādas nakts ar Pegiju, par kuru vienīgā persona, kas to zināja, bija Mārsija. Als nolemj atgūt formu pārliecinošam sniegumam, tā atgūstot pašapziņu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als no apavu veikala pieņem priekšlaicīgas pensionēšanās finansējumu 12 tūkstošu dolāru apmērā. Pegija atrod naudu un to iztērē vienas stundas laikā. Als ir spiests atgriezties darbā, kur viņš uzzina par iespēju iegādāties apavu veikalu ar nosaukumu "Home Plate Athletic Shoes".

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kādu rītu Als atklāj, ka viņa Dodge ir nozagts. Pēc Džefersona ierosinājuma Als nolemj apkrāpt apdrošināšanas kompāniju, un iznomā Lincoln Town Car... Līdz policija atrod viņa mīļoto transportlīdzekli.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Meitene, ko Erls pirms vairākiem gadiem Džojas dēļ pameta, ir kļuvusi par atlīdzību mednieci un cenšas izsekot Džoju. Erls jūtas atbildīgs par nekārtību, un Džoja viņam pastāsta, kā viņi īsti savienojās.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Meitene, ko Erls pirms vairākiem gadiem Džojas dēļ pameta, ir kļuvusi par atlīdzību mednieci un cenšas izsekot Džoju. Erls jūtas atbildīgs par nekārtību, un Džoja viņam pastāsta, kā viņi īsti savienojās.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erlam virsniekam ir jāatdod policijas žetons, ko viņš kādreiz atrada un izmantoja savā labā.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls uzzina, ka puisis, kuram viņš nozaga naudu, grasījās izmantot naudu laimīgās loterijas biļetes iegādei. Viņš atdod viņam naudu, kas ļoti sanikno Rendiju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls palīdz Džojai atbrīvoties no zagtas mašīnas, bet rodas problēma, kad viņi tajā kādu atrod.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kā tas ir, kad ģimene ceļ un grauj vienlaicīgi? Par to komēdijseriāla septītajā sezonā turpinās pārliecināties Reimonds, saukts arī par Reju, kuram ir ne tikai sieva, trīs bērni un sava sporta sleja avīzē, bet arī kolorīti vecāki, kuri dzīvo tur pat pāri ielai, un brālis. Tā kā Rejs ir mātes luteklītis, tas ietekmē attiecības gan ar brāli, gan sievu un pārējiem ģimenes locekļiem. Seriāls balstīts uz patiesiem notikumiem - visiem tiem, kuri var notikt ar ikvienu no mums, tāpēc bez smiekliem neiztikt.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.
